name: HEART À LA MODE
description:
HEART À LA MODE: a sugar sweet romantic comedy

♡ FIND US ON TWITTER: YAPPERU_OTOME ♡

Some people are really into movies. Others are really into cooking. Still others are really into knowing every detail of minor political figures’ lives. For your part, your guilty pleasure is being a cute mascot character’s devoted fan. And there’s nothing wrong with that! 

So what if you spend your disposable income on stuffed toys and scented erasers? So what if you attend mascot conventions whose target audience is aged 12 and below? You never know what sorts of people you might meet there, after all!

Join our protagonist on her riveting journey of money wasting, emotional turmoil and awkward romance! 

YES, YOUR ROOM LOOKS LIKE THIS! ISN'T IT UTTERLY DELIGHTFUL? ISN'T IT WHAT YOU'VE ALWAYS DREAMED OF?
